title: Five Wakto Prayer
description: People often ask, why do Muslims offer 5 times Namaz or prayer each day? Modern society thinks of it as some kind of a burden or pressure. So I would like to accentuate something on this subject today.

title: Code Practice
description: During that time I've come across a lot of typical issues. So I searched around and found some best practices that I've integrated into my workflow, and I've come up with things that have made my life or my team members' lives easier.

title: Go For Shopping
description: It is evident from my previous post alone that boys do not enjoy shopping like girls do but that's not the only difference there is between boys and girls when it comes to spending money.
